sentences.en: After touring the hospital, Her Majesty unveiled a commemorative plaque.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下巡视完这家医院后，为纪念匾揭了幕。

sentences.en: Even in great adversity, he retained [ kept ] his majesty.
sentences.cn: 纵令 身处绝境, 他仍保持自己的威严.

sentences.en: Her majesty awarded a distinction upon 〔 to 〕 the retiring Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下授勋给行将离任的首相.

sentences.en: Her Majesty later honoured the Headmaster with her presence at lunch.
sentences.cn: 随后女王陛下出席了午餐，令校长感到荣幸。

sentences.en: His Majesty requests your presence in the royal chambers.
sentences.cn: 国王陛下要在皇宫召见你。

sentences.en: Many of our troops and officers were scattered around the world in the service of His Majesty in the colonies.
sentences.cn: 我们的很多部队和军官分驻世界各地的英属殖民地，为英王效力。

sentences.en: Out of those experiences, everything from pomp to humor to erotic charisma to grief to majesty to the profoundly gruesome and monumentally spiritual worked its way into his tone.
sentences.cn: 撇开这些事不谈，每一件从华丽到幽默，到性爱的魅力，到悲伤，到雄伟，到深沉地阴森和不朽地黑人圣歌都流入他的音调当中。

sentences.en: Ride on, ride on in majesty.
sentences.cn: 策马前进, 威风凛凛地向前奔.

sentences.en: She became Her Britannic Majesty's new ambassador plenipotentiary to the Republic of Lebanon.
sentences.cn: 她成为了英国女王陛下驻黎巴嫩共和国的新任全权大使。
国王有无法形容的威严.

sentences.en: The majesty of the occasion thrilled us all.
sentences.cn: 那庄严的场面使我们每个人都激动不已.

sentences.en: The Prime Minister is here to see you, Your Majesty.
the pure majesty of the Alps
sentences.cn: 阿尔卑斯山的雄伟壮丽

sentences.en: the sheer majesty of St Peter's in Rome
sentences.cn: 罗马圣彼得大教堂的雄伟庄严

sentences.en: This is the majesty and the meaning of this moment.
sentences.cn: 这正是此时此刻之庄严及其意义所在.

sentences.en: We humbly beg Your Majesty to show mercy.
sentences.cn: 我们恳请陛下发发慈悲.

words.tran_cn: 庄严,崇高,雄伟,壮丽,威严

trans.tran_cn: 主权，统治权，陛下，王权，庄严，雄伟，光轮中的耶稣（圣母、上帝）圣像
trans.tran_en: used when talking to or about a king or queen
